content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case involving coowners of a property the case lasted for three years and the court has ordered the respondent to reimburse the party for the costs incurred totaling €278000 the appellant claims exclusive ownership of the entire apartment including a cellar room and a share of the buildings common areas the court ruled in favor of the appellant declaring them the sole owner of the property and ordering the transcription of the judgment the court also rejected the counterclaim for division made by the respondent and ordered them to reimburse the appellant for the costs of the proceedings
